msItem.title: Masir i Talibi fi bilad-i lfranji.
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: a) John Romer 1804. (Though undated the MS is thus earlier than any dated one noted by Storey.) b) Persian poem in transcription. c) Stamp, the name filled in in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by John Romer Esq. Folio one, verso: top right: impression of rectangular seal of John Romer, the name in Persian and devanagari dated 1811. An account of the journey of the author to Europe and back in A.H. 1213-1218, A.D. 1799-1803, with his observations on England and Europe. Headings etc. in red.

listBibl.bibl: Romer's gift is noted in the Journal for Gift of John Romer. 1837, p. xiv. (1 April) and Donations Register for 18 November 1848. (? Check the last)

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather binding, Carnegie Trust grant 1930, with title etc. tooled on spine.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: Travel, early Indian description of Europe and the sea voyage.
